content: Altho I’m upset that Li Shang won’t be in the latest Mulan, I dont really expect Disney of all companies to be progressive. Expecting Disney to be progressive is a fire that will always burn you.

I remember seeing ppl get excited at the possibility of getting Elsa from Frozen a female love interest & I’m like. Ha ha!! When pigs fly. 

Look at Disney’s track record, it aint happening.
